sentences.sContent: The plates are bounded by an interconnected network of ridges, transform faults, and trenches.
sentences.sContent_eng: The plates are bounded by an interconnected network of ridges, transform faults, and trenches.
sentences.sCn: 板块以一个由洋中脊、转换断层和海沟相互连接形成的网络为界。

sentences.sContent: All the vascular bundles are interconnected so that transport between organs carried on rapidly and efficiently .
sentences.sContent_eng: All the vascular bundles are interconnected so that transport between organs carried on rapidly and efficiently .
sentences.sCn: 所有维管束都互相连通，因而得以迅速而有效地完成器官之间的运输。

sentences.sContent: But what we wanna be able to do is kind of think through how this reactor, steam generator and pressuriser are interconnected with all the systems.
sentences.sContent_eng: But what we wanna be able to do is kind of think through how this reactor, steam generator and pressuriser are interconnected with all the systems.
sentences.sCn: 但是我们想要能够做的就是思考，这个电站，蒸汽发生器，和加压的，是如何的与所有的系统相互作用的。

remMethod.val: inter(在…中间) + connect(连接) + ed → 在中间连接 → 相互连接的
